name: Talkman Travel: Rome
description:
Travel overseas with Talkman™ Travel! Talkman™ Travel supports jet set travelers going to Rome, Italy with its conversational phrases, pictures, maps, and suggestions for sightseeing, food or souvenirs. Break the ice with the locals and enjoy your trip! Buon viaggio!
Key Features
• Search for phrases and play them in the desired language.
• Bookmark function to show and play only the phrases you use often.
• Link your favorite phrases to built in photographs or your own photographs to communicate more effectively.
• Record travel memories on photos saved to your Memory Stick™ and arrange them on a map of your destination's capital city.
• Play mini games-The Love Match, Fortune for Two, and The Massage Detector to help you bond with the people you meet.
Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PLAYSTATION®Network Terms of Service, this item’s use restrictions, and other terms and conditions located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements.
